attributes.action: Protect Cable and Freeview Commercial Channels like ITV2-4, Sky One and Two, UKTV and Living from being used as pawns in corporate wranglings now or in the future in the light of the Virgin Media versus Sky basic services standoff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the past 10 years a number of much loved commercial digital channels have formed the foundation for the most basic cable services and freeview packages. We the undersigned believe that these channels such as Sky One should be protected from being taken off the air on any platform simply because the companies concernece cannot reach agreement on the cost of those services. Where this happens the deal should be sent to arbitration automatically so that the customer is protected and thus ensuring their interests remain paramount at all times.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
